document.full_text: the publisher of u.s. author greg mortenson's memoir, "three cups of tea," said on monday it was reviewing the bestseller following claims that parts of the inspirational book were fabricated.
document.title: publisher reviews claims in memoir "three cups of tea"
lines_and_colors: the publisher of u.s. author greg mortenson's memoir, "three cups of tea," said on monday it was reviewing the bestseller following claims that parts of the inspirational book were fabricated.
